#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
//int Table[]
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    //dp();
    while(t--)
    {
        int a,b,c,d;
        cin>>a>>b>>c>>d;
        int flag=0;
        if((a%c)==0&&(b%d)==0)flag=1;
        if((a%d)==0&&(b%c)==0)flag=1;
        if(flag==1)cout<<"yes\n";
        else cout<<"no\n";

    }
}
